item.title: Version 1.1
item.description:
Second release, with bugfixes, one new feature and increased awesomeness!

Features

  • Even more efficient! Spotifree is now detecting whether Spotify is running, and when it's not â€“ becomes "idle", consuming 0 energy.

Fixes

  • The "about" window was being opened behind the active window
  • "Download Updates Automatically" checkbox wasn't disabled when "Check For Updates Automatically" is not checked.
  • Stability improvements

Other changes

  • New, monochrome statusbar icon (still ugly, but not sticking out as much)
  • Updated the "About" window
